channel.title: Guide on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Guide on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Devbox Shell: Your Dev Environment, Your Rules
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Devbox Shell: Your Dev Environment, Your Rules So you’ve installed Devbox with that nifty one-liner: curl -fsSL https://get.jetify.com/devbox | bash Now what?

item.title: Devbox.json: Your Project's DNA
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Devbox.json: Your Project’s DNA Ever wished you could clone your perfect dev environment? With devbox.json, you can. This little file is the beating heart of your Devbox setup.

item.title: Ditch the Containers: Go Containerless with Devbox
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Ditch the Containers: Go Containerless with Devbox Containers are great, but sometimes they’re overkill. With Devbox Services and Plugins, you can create a sleek, containerless environment for local development.
